input_text:
Job Title: Business Development Representative

Location: Littleton, CO

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Consulting, Sales

Description:
Are you ready to start a career in Tech Sales? Do you thrive on success and the ability to help local businesses succeed? Ready to earn top dollar with a company who you can stand behind, and service that stands behind you?! Frontier Business Products has been providing quality products to Colorado Businesses along the Front Range for over 43 years. We’ve recently been presented with the 2022 Sharp Platinum dealership award along with the 2022 Ricoh Circle of Excellence.
We’re looking for Sales Professionals to tell our story in the various locations listed below. Each territory has a generous base of current customers that you will be supporting and selling to as well as thousands of prospects. Base salary varies depending on qualifications and experience starting between $45,000 to $60,000, plus un-capped commission; OTE $60,000-$85,000.
Locations: Aurora, Arvada, Boulder, Denver, DTC, Longmont, Thornton, Louisville, Parker, Colorado Springs, Pueblo, and Ft. Collins
Responsibilities:· Develop relationships with prospects and current clients· Willing to manage and grow existing accounts with additional technology offerings· Promote products and service solutions to businesses· Track potential and current clients· Complete contract negotiations and documentation.· Make calls both in person and on the phone to develop new business opportunities· Achieve/exceed sales and activity objectives on a weekly and monthly basis· Manage full account cycle
Requirements:· 2 years Business to Business or Industry experience is a PLUS· Honest, Enthusiastic and Open to learn new products and skill sets· Deadline and detail oriented.· Customer service focused· Valid driver’s license, reliable vehicle; able to pass a background check
Benefits include: Health, dental and vision insurance, Life and AD&D insurance-, Short- and Long-term disability, Paid, vacation, sick and holiday pay, 401k with matching.
Frontier Business Products accepts application for this position on an on-going basis.
Frontier Business Products is committed to providing an equal employment opportunity for all applicants for employment without regard race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, military status, or any other category protected by applicable law

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Business Development Representative
output_json.summary: Seeking Sales Professionals to tell the story of Frontier Business Products in various locations.
output_json.required_experience_years: 2 years Business to Business or Industry experience
soft_skills: Open to learn new products and skill sets
job_responsibilities: Develop relationships with prospects and current clients
Manage and grow existing accounts with additional technology offerings
Promote products and service solutions to businesses
Make calls both in person and on the phone to develop new business opportunities
Achieve/exceed sales and activity objectives on a weekly and monthly basis
benefits: Paid, vacation, sick and holiday pay
output_json.equal_opportunity_policy: Frontier Business Products is committed to providing an equal employment opportunity for all applicants for employment without regard race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, military status, or any other category protected by applicable law
